title: ISSI hosts seminar on IIOJK situation on Monday
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 2 (APP):The Institute of Strategic Studies (ISSI) will host a seminar on “India’s Illegal and Unilateral Actions in Indian Illegally Occupied Jammu Kashmir (IIOJK) five-year on”
The seminar will be held on Monday (August 5) to highlight the atrocities and barbarism being perpetrated by Indian
Spokesperson and Additional Foreign Secretary, Ministry of Foreign Affairs Mumtaz Zahra Baloch will be the chief
guest and express views on “Jammu and Kashmir Dispute and the Response of the International Community”, said
Executive Director, CISS AJK Dr. Asma Shakir Khawaja will deliver the speech on “The Jammu and Kashmir Dispute and Strategic Stability in South Asia”.
Chairman, Kashmir Institute of International Relations (KIIR) Altaf Hussain Wani will address on subject “Kashmir Freedom Struggle and the Role of Youth”.
APHC leader Mehmood Saghar will speak on “Current Situation in IIOJK and the Myth of Normalcy and Development.”
